Notes: Opens file picker and loads PDF
Inline text editing mode - click any text to edit
Opens modal with font/size/color options to add text
Extracts text from current page using Tesseract.js
Requires external backend server at localhost:5000
Click on PDF to add sticky notes with editable text
Activates inline text editing mode - click any text to edit
Activates image selection mode - click images to select/move/resize/delete
Opens Add Text modal with font options

Rotates current page via prompt (90° CW/CCW or 180°) - updates document
Activates Edit Image mode - drag corners to resize selected images
Shows alignment options dialog - UI only (objects not yet linked)
Crops current page by setting margins via prompt with validation
Extracts current page to new PDF document
Requires external backend server at localhost:5000
Opens file picker to select multiple PDFs and merges them into new tab
Splits PDF at specified page number
Add PDF files to merge queue
Merge all PDFs in queue into single file
Open the merged PDF result in new canvas tab
